name: Spears
description:
Spears is a splitscreen two player island dueling game.

Play the best of three! Or, the best of ten! It's your choice!

Take place on a low poly island with a low poly caveman with your friend and fight to the death!

Spears is in early access and will be receiving a lot of updates.

This game was made in the Blender Game Engine, but I am learning unity and I will be switching platforms. This could happen anywhere from within the next month or the next year.

This is very early alpha playtesting, and things will be changing.

PLEASE report any bugs or anything that went wrong inside the game!

Most of all, have fun! And leave feedback!
